DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy intravenous ( IV ) ferumoxytol compare IV iron sucrose treatment iron deficiency anemia ( IDA ) subject chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Ferumoxytol Compared Iron Sucrose Treatment Iron Deficiency Anemia Adult Subjects With Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.criteria: Key Inclusion Criteria include : 1 . Males females ≥18 year age 2 . An eGFR < 60 mL/min diagnosis CKD ( eg , nephropathy , nephritis ) 3 . Hemoglobin < 11.0 g/dL 4 . TSAT < 30 % 5 . Hemodialysis subject maintenance dialysis least three month prior screen currently receive dialysis three time per week 6 . Female subject childbearing potential sexually active must effective method birth control least 1 month prior screen agree remain birth control completion study Key Exclusion Criteria include : 1 . History allergy IV iron 2 . Allergy 2 class drug 3 . Female subject pregnant intend become pregnant , breastfeeding , within 3 month postpartum , positive serum urine pregnancy test 4 . Hemoglobin ≤7.0 g/dL 5 . Received another investigational agent within 4 week prior screen , plan receipt investigational agent specify protocol study period 6 . Known cause anemia iron deficiency ( eg , hemolysis , vitamin B12 folate deficiency , etc )
